          South Africa portal
         </a>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </table>
     </div>
     <table class="metadata mbox-small" style="border:1px solid #aaa;background-color:#f9f9f9">
      <tr>
       <td class="mbox-image">
        <img alt="Book icon" data-file-height="48" data-file-width="48" height="30" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a8/Office-book.svg/30px-Office-book.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a8/Office-book.svg/45px-Office-book.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a8/Office-book.svg/60px-Office-book.svg.png 2x" width="30"/>
       </td>
       <td class="mbox-text plainlist">
        <ul style="font-weight: bold">
         <li>
          <a href="/wiki/Book:FIFA_World_Cup" title="Book:FIFA World Cup">
           Book: FIFA World Cup
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </td>
      </tr>
     </table>
     <ul>
      <li>
       <a href="/wiki/July_2010_Kampala_attacks" title="July 2010 Kampala attacks">
        July 2010 Kampala attacks
       </a>
       , a series of terrorist bombings in
       <a href="/wiki/Kampala" title="Kampala">
        Kampala
       </a>
       , Uganda, timed to coincide with the final match
      </li>
      <li>
       <i>
        <a href="/wiki/Listen_Up!_The_Official_2010_FIFA_World_Cup_Album" title="Listen Up! The Official 2010 FIFA World Cup Album">
         Listen Up! The Official 2010 FIFA World Cup Album
        </a>
       </i>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a href="/wiki/Paul_the_Octopus" title="Paul the Octopus">
        Paul the Octopus
       </a>
       and
       <a href="/wiki/Mani_the_parakeet" title="Mani the parakeet">
        Mani the parakeet
       </a>
       , animals who predicted results of the matches
      </li>
     </ul>
     <div style="clear:both;">
     </div>

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3A2010+FIFA+World+Cup&amp;rft.btitle=World+Cup+2010%3A+Blatter+apologises+for+disallowed+goal&amp;rft.date=29+June+2010&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.bbc.co.uk%2Fsport2%2Fhi%2Ffootball%2Fworld_cup_2010%2F8771294.stm&amp;rft.pub=BBC+Sport&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">

       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-69">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-69">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         In the
         <a href="/wiki/1962_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1962 FIFA World Cup">
          1962
         </a>
         ,
         <a href="/wiki/1970_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1970 FIFA World Cup">
          1970
         </a>
         ,
         <a href="/wiki/1994_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1994 FIFA World Cup">
          1994
         </a>
         , and
         <a href="/wiki/2002_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2002 FIFA World Cup">
          2002
         </a>
         World Cups, Brazil finished as undefeated champions. In the
         <a href="/wiki/1978_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1978 FIFA World Cup">
          1978
         </a>
         competition, Brazil was eliminated by Argentina on goal difference without losing a match. In the
         <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/1986_World_Cup" title="1986 World Cup">
          1986
         </a>
         competition, Brazil was eliminated in a penalty shootout with France, without having lost a match.
        </span>
       </li>

       <li id="cite_note-72">

          <a href="#cite_ref-72">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         Brazil won their first World Cup in Sweden. England, Argentina, and France each won it for the first time on home soil 
         <span class="citation web">
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.fifa.com/tournaments/archive/worldcup/index.html" rel="nofollow">

          </a>
          . FIFA

           </span>

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3A2010+FIFA+World+Cup&amp;rft.btitle=Previous+FIFA+World+Cups&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.fifa.com%2Ftournaments%2Farchive%2Fworldcup%2Findex.html&amp;rft.pub=FIFA&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">

          <sup>

          .
         </span>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3A2010+FIFA+World+Cup&amp;rft.btitle=FIFA+Fan+Fest&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.fifa.com%2Fworldcup%2Forganisation%2Ffanfest%2Findex.html&amp;rft.pub=FIFA&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
        </span>
       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-146">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-146">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <span class="citation web">
          Sikiti da Silva, Issa (5 June 2010).
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.bizcommunity.com/Article/196/147/49669.html" rel="nofollow">
           "FIFA Fan Fests: some facts and figures"
          </a>
          . Bizcommunity.com
          <span class="reference-accessdate">
           . Retrieved
           <span class="nowrap">
            1 December
           </span>
           2011
          </span>
          .
         </span>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3A2010+FIFA+World+Cup&amp;rft.aufirst=Issa&amp;rft.aulast=Sikiti+da+Silva&amp;rft.au=Sikiti+da+Silva%2C+Issa&amp;rft.btitle=FIFA+Fan+Fests%3A+some+facts+and+figures&amp;rft.date=5+June+2010&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bizcommunity.com%2FArticle%2F196%2F147%2F49669.html&amp;rft.pub=Bizcommunity.com&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ol>
     </div>

              </a>
             </li>

   <h2>
    Navigation menu
   </h2>
   <div id="mw-head">
    <div aria-labelledby="p-personal-label" class="" id="p-personal" role="navigation">
     <h3 id="p-personal-label">
      Personal tools
     </h3>

        <a href="//zh-yue.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010%E5%B9%B4FIFA%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%9B%83" hreflang="zh-yue" lang="zh-yue" title="2010FIFA  Cantonese">
         
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="interlanguage-link interwiki-zh">
        <a href="//zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%9B%83%E8%B6%B3%E7%90%83%E8%B3%BD" hreflang="zh" lang="zh" title="2010  Chinese">
         
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="uls-p-lang-dummy">
        <a href="#">
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
